summary: This document is email correspondence between an Assistant United States Attorney and Judge Gorenstein's chambers regarding a search warrant application for Jeffrey Epstein's electronic devices. The AUSA submits a revised affidavit correcting a date error (Epstein's arrest date listed as 2020 instead of 2019) and schedules a call with the judge and an agent.

persons.name: Judge Gorenstein
persons.context: Federal judge reviewing a search warrant application for Jeffrey Epstein's electronic devices, noting a date error in the affidavit.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Attorney from the Southern District of New York submitting a revised search warrant application for Epstein's devices and coordinating a call with the judge.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The target of the search warrant application for his electronic devices, with reference to his arrest date.

connections.description: Prosecutor submitting a search warrant application to the judge for review and approval.
Prosecutor seeking judicial authorization to search Epstein's electronic devices as part of an investigation.

events.title: Scheduled Call on Search Warrant
events.description: A call scheduled between Judge Gorenstein, the AUSA, and an agent to discuss the search warrant application for Epstein's electronic devices.

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein's Arrest
events.description: Epstein was arrested on July 6, 2019; the warrant application initially incorrectly listed the year as 2020.

locations: 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: A search warrant application was submitted to Judge Gorenstein for authorization to search Jeffrey Epstein's electronic devices.
The initial application contained an error listing Epstein's arrest date as July 6, 2020, instead of the correct date in 2019.
The Assistant U.S. Attorney submitted a revised affidavit correcting the date error.
A call was scheduled for June 26, 2020, at 9:10 a.m. between the judge, the AUSA, and an agent to discuss the warrant.
